channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Best Smart Speakers (2025): Alexa, Google Assistant, Siri
item.description: Chatty assistants from Amazon, Google, and Apple are popular. But which one is right for you?

item.description: Keep your logins locked down with our favorite password management apps for PC, Mac, Android, iPhone, and web browsers.

item.title: Sony PlayStation DualSense Edge Controller Review: Gaming Upgrade
item.description: Sony’s ultimate PS5 gamepad comes with a hefty price but can seriously up your game.

item.title: Google fixes Chrome zero-day security flaw used in hacking campaign targeting journalists
item.description: Kaspersky attributed the hacks to an espionage campaign targeting journalists and employees at educational institutions.

item.title: A New Social Media App Punishes Users for Rage-Baiting
item.description: On Sez Us, users who are intentionally inflammatory may score lower than those who gain influence through respectful dialogue.
